metadata.title: CVE-2024-43429 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle. Some hidden user profile fields are visible ingradebook reports, which could result in users without the "view hiddenuser fields" capability having access to the information.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
